channel.title: KeyPhraseTransformer on Sai Kaushik Soma
channel.description: Recent content in KeyPhraseTransformer on Sai Kaushik Soma

item.title: KeyPhraseTransformer
item.description: KeyPhraseTransformer is built on T5 Transformer architecture, trained on 500,000 training samples to extract important phrases/topics/themes from text of any length. Why KeyPhraseTransformer? You get the power of amazing T5 architecture. The underlying T5 model is specifically trained in extracting important phrases from the text corpus, so the results are of superior quality. No pre-processing is needed of any kind. Just dump your data to the model It does not need any n-gram-related inputs from user.
